title: Budtender
coverLetter:
To Whom It May Concern:


I recently relocated from Chicago to LA to pursue a career in the cannabis industry. As a daily cannabis user for over 8 years, I bring a knowledge and understanding of the product. As a recent transplant, my passion for cannabis continues to grow and it has been inspiring to see all the incredible potential it has for society. Whether it is flower, concentrate, soaks and relief patches, it is a new and exciting time for the cannabis industry and I look forward to being a part of that future. 


Throughout my career I have enjoyed a range of customer service positions and want to bring that knowledge, empathy, and passion to helping patients. I love to meet with people and develop relationships. Relationship building around cannabis brings out a passion in me that I can only describe as inherent to everything I am. It is for these reasons I feel I would be a valuable addition to the team. I have a strong desire to care for people and nothing is more rewarding than a customer leaving satisfied and pleased from the work I executed for them. 


I look forward to hearing from you and learning more about a potential role where I can continue to develop my knowledge and fulfill my passion.


Thank you,

Caitlin Wheeland
